channel.title: I changed item amount in gen. shop it didnt do nothing?
channel.description: i changed the id of a pot in varrock shopkeeper it did not change nothing. after i changed amount i saved it. then restarted and compiled and logged in?

item.title: I changed item amount in gen. shop it didnt do nothing?
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

if you changed the price in the itemdef.xml then you need to change it in items.rscd in your clientconf.

Read full topic
item.source: I changed item amount in gen. shop it didnt do nothing?
